user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (thompson@prospectiveclients.com) with detailed information about TelNet’s services and to consult her past email exchanges for reference.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Detailed Service Information for Mr. Thompson

Hi Jane,

Could you please prepare and send a detailed overview of TelNet’s services to Mr. Thompson (thompson@prospectiveclients.com)?  
When compiling the information, kindly refer back to your previous email exchanges with him to ensure you cover all the points he’s already raised.

Thank you for your prompt assistance!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
